page.title: 05ESTON LEISURE CENTRE
page.content: Eston swimming baths were built in 1960 by the Eston Urban District Council but are now owned by Langbaurgh Council. Last year altogether over{59,000}under 18s attended the baths &{26,000 adults . {Of these 7,569}adults were free and{17,184 under 18's}were{free.}The busiest day at the baths is Wednesday this is because on that day there is free entry until 5.00pm.The normal entry fee is 25p.There are 16 people employed at the baths.In a separate building there is a Turkish Baths. The sports hall caters for all indoor sports.It was built much later than the baths.
